mapper.sql: addressid, province, city, area, street, price, describes, phone, dateset, personalid, istemplate, updataset, accurate
mapper.insert: insert into bwt_connector_address (addressid, province, city, area, street, price, describes, phone, dateset, personalid, istemplate, updataset, accurate) values (#{addressid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{street,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateset,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{personalid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{istemplate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updataset,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{accurate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update bwt_connector_address
province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER},
street = #{street,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
describes = #{describes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dateset = #{dateset,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
personalid = #{personalid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
istemplate = #{istemplate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updataset = #{updataset,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
accurate = #{accurate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where addressid = #{addressid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bwt_connector_address set province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, street = #{street,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describes = #{describes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dateset = #{dateset,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, personalid = #{personalid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, istemplate = #{istemplate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updataset = #{updataset,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, accurate = #{accurate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where addressid = #{addressid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT p.areaname FROM `pb_area` p WHERE p.`id` = b.province) provincename, (SELECT p.areaname FROM `pb_area` p WHERE p.`id` = b.city) cityname, (SELECT p.areaname FROM `pb_area` p WHERE p.`id` = b.area) areaname, (SELECT p.areaname FROM `pb_area` p WHERE p.`id` = b.street) streetname, b.* FROM `bwt_connector_address` b WHERE b.`personalid` = ${personalid}
